text: allah anumætiya nodun kisivak ovunta dharmayak vasayen tabanu labana samanayan (devivarun)da ovunta ætteda? (napurata sarilana phalavipaka dima paralovadi yayi) tinduva gæna vu (deviyange) poronduva niyama novi tibune nam, (me vana vitat) ovun atare tindu di hamaraya. niyata vasayenma (mevæni) aparadhakarayinta nam, ovunta itamat vedana gena dena danduvam æta
